results.text_hl: The favorable effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@pulmonary arterial hypertension@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@PAH@@@) has been well defined despite the unknown etiology of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@PAH@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin rescues rats from fatal pulmonary hypertension by inducing apoptosis of neointimal smooth muscle cells.
results.text_hl: When @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with severe @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@PAH@@@ received @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (2 mg x kg(-1) x d(-1) by gavage) from week 11, there was 100% survival and reversal of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@PAH@@@ after 2 weeks (mPAP=36 mm Hg) and 6 weeks (mPAP=24 mm Hg) of therapy.

citations.NLM: Nishimura T, Vaszar LT, Faul JL, Zhao G, Berry GJ, Shi L, Qiu D, Benson G, Pearl RG, Kao PN. Simvastatin rescues rats from fatal pulmonary hypertension by inducing apoptosis of neointimal smooth muscle cells. Circulation. 2003 Sep 30;108(13):1640-5. PMID: 12963647
